name: Freeing Quency
description:
"Into the dungeon Quency went and behind Quency I followed..."

Defeat onslaughts of vile monsters to free Quency from the dungeon's deepest depths.

Controls
  • Movement: WASD / Arrows
  • Boost: Space Bar / CTRL
  • Attack: Left Mouse Button
  • Pause: ESC
Support

Like the game? Consider leaving a donation, or supporting me on Patreon.
